Content: High level and low level don't mean what you think they mean in programming

Author: wrdg
Content: Enforce script reflects a C style syntax, in which several languages use. You don't need to go out your way to learn C, C++, or C#. Sure they're good languages for developing, but they're not going to directly help you script in enforce script, which is what dayz is built on

Content: The bi wiki is a basic run down of the absolute basics for enforce script. But that only makes sense if you're familiar with any kind of object oriented programming language
